data.question: What is the empirical formula of IRMOF-76?
At what temperature were the PXRD data for IRMOF-76 collected?
What crystal system does IRMOF-76 belong to?
What is the space group of IRMOF-77?
What method was used for absorption correction in the structure refinement of IRMOF-76?
What is the formula weight of IRMOF-77?
What is the final R index (R1) for IRMOF-77 after SQUEEZE?
What is the Langmuir surface area of activated IRMOF-77 measured at 77 K?
What is the pore volume of activated IRMOF-77?
What is the temperature range for the TGA trace of as-synthesized IRMOF-77?
data.answer: Up to 150 ºC corresponds to the loss of guest solvents, and from 300 to 400 ºC indicates the decomposition of the material.

data.question: Is the crystal density of IRMOF-77 higher or lower than 1 g cm-3?
Does the TGA trace of activated IRMOF-77 show weight loss due to the loss of coordinated pyridine?
data.answer: Yes, the weight loss around 180 ºC is attributed to the partial loss of coordinated pyridine.

data.question: Was the BET surface area of quinoline-exchanged IRMOF-77 measured at 77 K similar to that of IRMOF-77?
data.answer: Yes, both have similar BET surface areas of around 1590 m2 g-1.

data.question: Is the pore size distribution for activated IRMOF-77 consistent with its cavity size?
data.answer: Yes, the pore size distribution reveals the presence of two types of pores, whose diameters are around 14 and 19 Å, corresponding to the cavity size of IRMOF-77 (15 × 20 Å).

data.question: Was an absorption correction performed for the structure refinement of IRMOF-77?
data.answer: False, no absorption correction was performed.

data.question: Is the crystal system of IRMOF-77 cubic?
data.answer: False, IRMOF-77 belongs to the trigonal crystal system.

data.question: Does the TGA trace of IRMOF-77 indicate the presence of guest solvents?
data.answer: True, the huge weight loss up to 150 ºC corresponds to the loss of guest solvents.

data.question: Is the Langmuir surface area of activated IRMOF-77 less than 1000 m2 g-1?
data.answer: False, the Langmuir surface area of activated IRMOF-77 is 1610 m2 g-1.

data.question: Does the pore volume of activated IRMOF-77 exceed 1 cm3 g-1?
data.answer: False, the pore volume of activated IRMOF-77 is 0.57 cm3 g-1.

data.question: Is the density of IRMOF-77 after quinoline exchange higher than 1 g cm-3?
data.answer: False, the density of quinoline-exchanged IRMOF-77 is 0.97 g cm-3.
